tweet.text: Before jet airplanes made transcontinental air travel easily accessible even for tourists, U.S. diplomatic couriers often traveled tens of thousands of miles per year. How? Find out in Before the Jet Age, a new documentary from @historyatstate https://t.co/DrRfzE1NaZ
tweet.html: Before jet airplanes made transcontinental air travel easily accessible even for tourists, U.S. diplomatic couriers often traveled tens of thousands of miles per year. How? Find out in Before the Jet Age, a new documentary from @HistoryAtState go.usa.gov/xPyBg
